message: The regular trash pick up was ok from day 1 Some residents had to learn how to proper position the bin or things like that. The problem is with the big items like furniture. For weeks nobody picks them up. If they were tenants who left nobody calls and arrange for a pick up. Sommething should be done here so our neighbourhoods could look nice again
